full_summary: ## Tender Title Managed Security Services Provider ===================================== ## Overview Tender title: Managed Security Services Provider Tender description: VIA Information Technology (IT) department is seeking an IT Managed Security Services Provider (MSSP) to manage the company's security event monitoring, incident detection and response activities. ### Mandatory Requirements * **Language Requirements:** The Proponent must provide fluent written and verbal support in both official languages of Canada (English and French) as per the language of choice by the VIA IT requester. * **Experience:** The Proponent must have at least five (5) years of experience providing Managed Security Services for clients in Canada and/or the US with a hybrid IT infrastructure (on-premises and cloud) of similar scale and complexity to VIA. * **Access to Solution Dashboard:** The Proponent will provide VIA with read-only access to the solution's dashboard and customer portal for monitoring and visibility purposes. * **Security Operations Center (SOC):** The Proponent must have an established and functioning SOC at one or more facilities in Canada and/or the US with 24/7/365 monitoring capabilities. * **Threat Intelligence:** The Proponent must demonstrate the ability to perform research and access high-quality threat intelligence relevant to the Canadian government, Crown corporations, transportation industry, or North American critical infrastructure contexts. * **Security Certifications:** The Proponent's SOC must be SOC2, or SOC3 attestation reporting in security and availability principles and demonstrating compliance with globally recognized IT frameworks and control standards. * **Service Management and Ticketing:** The Proponent must integrate with VIA's IT service management and ticketing solution (ServiceNow) for incident management and response activities. ## Additional Requirements * **Transportation or Railway Industry Reference:** One (1) of the Proponent's references must be in the transportation or railway industry. * **Professional Services:** The Proponent must operate a credible professional services practice, including security strategy, compliance, testing, and risk management. * **Tickets and Milestones:** Bidding and documents are available on www.merx.com. Fees may apply, see www.merx.com/public/pricing for more information. ### Tender Contact Information * Gina Siviero - gina\_siviero\@viarail.ca - 514-871-6536 * For more information and to submit a bid, please visit www.merx.com [direct link](https
